Class DataGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Random
      • org.jetel.util.DataGenerator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class DataGenerator
extends java.util.Random

    Data Generator

    The class should support all random data in future.
